title: AI-Driven Creative Writing Project: Storytelling and Natural Language Generation Tool Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic writing skills and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: An experimental writing education environment using AI tools, where students engage in creative projects individually or in small groups, utilizing digital devices and AI text generation tools as primary learning instruments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete at least 80% of a short story draft using AI text generation tools.
Learners can critically analyze AI-generated outputs and write feedback proposing creative alternatives at least three times.
Learners can plan and develop five or more original story ideas using AI as an auxiliary tool.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
